0x964BAB1D.name: GET_RESOURCE_METADATA

params.name: metadataKey
params.description: The key in the resource manifest.

params.name: index
params.description: The value index, in a range from \[0..GET_NUM_RESOURCE_METDATA-1].

0x964BAB1D.description:
Gets the metadata value at a specified key/index from a resource's manifest.
See also: [Resource manifest](https://docs.fivem.net/docs/scripting-reference/resource-manifest/resource-manifest/)
